about_the_game:
Experience an amazing adventure with Dick Ranger, who set off in search of his lost father Phil, a valued explorer and anthropologist.
Travel with the hero through different lands and places, such as:
- ancient ruins
- dense jungle
- dark tombs
- secret tunnels
- caves
- hot desert

During your journey you will come across dangerous traps and face dangerous and unusual enemies. Solve puzzles that require cleverness and intelligence.
Collect unique items, keys, crystals and fill your purse with coins.
Break through narrow gaps, climb, blow up obstacles in your way.

If you want adventure in the old school style, Dick Ranger invites You on your journey.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 19.3
  • Processor: G3258
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 19.3
  • Processor: G3258
  • Memory: 6000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

name: Dick Ranger Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: G3258
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: G3258
  • Memory: 6000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
